Author: MonsterGrandma
Text: Thank you for the extremely kind words.. Hugs from my side

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I’m sorry you’re in a place of feeling so much pain. I can relate to feeling...just, done, and I really hope that things will improve for you. You do have worth and you do deserve good things, even when parts of your brain say otherwise. I also hope you’ll take good care of the wounds and seek medical attention if necessary. Zen hugs.
